author: Chris Riotta, Chris Riotta
title: Coronavirus: Makeshift ICUs lack crucial protections to prevent outbreaks among hospital staff, workers say
description: One nurse tells The Independent: 'I've just accepted that I'll eventually get the virus – I just hope I can work a while before that happens'
content:
Makeshift intensive care units (ICUs) built to cope with an influx of Covid-19 patients lack crucial rooms for doctors and nurses to remove protective equipment and prevent potential outbreaks among hospital staff, sources told The Independent.
